remarks: Value of the object part of the functor composition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jan-2017.)
statement:
cofuval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cofuval.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
cofuval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( D Func E ) ) $.
cofu2nd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
cofu1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` ( G o.func F ) ) ` X ) = ( ( 1st ` G ) ` ( ( 1st ` F ) ` X ) ) ) $.
